org.jlinalg
Class RingElementFactory<RE extends RingElement>

java.lang.Object
  org.jlinalg.RingElementFactory<RE>
Type Parameters:
RE - The type of the values the factory produces.
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRingElementFactory<RE>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BigDecimalWrapperFactory, Complex.ComplexFactory, DoubleWrapper.DoubleWrapperFactory, F2.F2Factory, FieldPAbstractFactory, PolynomialFactory, Rational.RationalFactory
public abstract class RingElementFactory<RE extends RingElement>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRingElementFactory<RE>

This defines the interface for the factories used to create instances (and possibly hold a cache of) IRingElements and to create arrays of such elements. The later is in particular necessary, as generic classes cannot create arrays of the elements they are used for.

Most IRingElements would hold an instance of a factory in a static field and use this reference.

Author:
Georg Thimm (2008)
